about_the_game:
Satelital is under development. Screenshots showcase the current state of the project, not the final result.

Satelital is a sci-fi puzzle adventure where you control a high-tech satellite designed to study the unexplored Lumen solar system. As an astronaut on a mission, you'll journey between planets, using advanced sensors to interact with artifacts left behind by an unknown form of life. These geometrical structures can be found across diverse landscapes, holding secrets within their patterns and shapes.

While the purpose of these artifacts remains unclear, environmental clues will invite you to explore, connect the dots, and slowly uncover the mystery that extends across the planets. You'll need to observe your surroundings and piece together the meaning of what you find. As you progress, the connections between these artifacts will begin to reveal themselves, offering new challenges and deeper insights into this distant world.

Key Features

• Solve puzzles

• Orbit in space

• Travel to distant planets

• Find natural patterns

• Experience peaceful landscapes

short_description: Piloting a remote satellite, you'll dive deep into a distant solar system filled with artifacts left by an unknown form of life. Explore mysterious planets to solve puzzles hidden in strange symbols and patterns.
